ModMetaData.name: Misc. Robots
ModMetaData.author: HK
ModMetaData.description:
Hexon Corporation proudly presents a whole new line of Bots to employ in your explorations across the galaxy!
This mod adds some Bots for you to purchase from traders or build on your own if you survive long enough!
- HaulBot - JanitorBot - CraftBot - MedBot - MinerBot - HydroponicsBot
PSA: Due to insane demand the combat issue Hunter-Killer is currently unavailable (the rumours that they killed everyone at the production facility are of course quite false!)
v1.1 Modified xml and graphics by hunt3rkill3r
Original mod and code by Haplo (https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=3612.0)
Various original droids concepts and graphics by Jabbamonkey, Nephilite, Rooki1, mrofa and Vas.
This mod is to be used within the confines of Hardcore-SK by Skyarkhangel.
